paramecia.name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
paramecia.description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, effectively turning them into a Rubber Human.

paramecia.name: Awa Awa no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to emit and control soap and bubbles that can not only clean off dirt but can also 'clean off' power, making the user a Soap Human.

paramecia.name: Baku Baku no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to eat anything. The eaten items can then be merged into and manifested from the user's body or be combined to create something else.

paramecia.name: Bara Bara no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to split their own body into pieces and control said pieces however they wish, as well as making the user immune to slashing attacks, making the user a Splitting Human.

paramecia.name: Bomu Bomu no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to make any part of their body explode, whether it be their limbs, hair, mucus, or even breath, making the user a Bomb Human.

paramecia.name: Doru Doru no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to create large quantities of candle wax from their body and control it, making the user a Candle Human.

paramecia.name: Hana Hana no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to replicate and sprout pieces of their body from the surface of any object or living thing. As further allusion to this, pinkish-white petal-like particles form at and then swirl away from where the parts sprout and vanish, as well as around the user itself.

paramecia.name: Kage Kage no Mi
paramecia.description: Gives the user the ability to manifest and control shadows of living creatures, including their own, as physical and tangible forms. The user, becoming a Ruler of Shadows, can steal the shadows of other beings and insert them into different bodies, living or dead, which in the latter case enables the creation of zombies.

paramecia.name: Kiro Kiro no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to change their weight from 1 to 10,000 kilograms without, in any way, affecting the overall size of their bodies.

paramecia.name: Sube Sube no Mi
paramecia.description: Makes the user's body smooth and slippery, which in turn makes most attacks and objects slide off their body, protecting the user from harm in most situations.

paramecia.name: Yomi Yomi no Mi
paramecia.description: Enhances the user's soul to the point where they resurrect after their first death, allowing them to live a second time and to use several other soul-based abilities, making the user a Reviving Human.

paramecia.name: Mero Mero no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows a range of attacks which use emotions of lust or perversion to transform opponents into stone.

paramecia.name: Mochi Mochi no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into mochi.

paramecia.name: Jiki Jiki no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to create magnetic forces and use them to control metal.

paramecia.name: Ope Ope no Mi
paramecia.description: grants the ability to manifest a spherical space in which the user can manipulate the orientation, movements, and physical configuration of anything and anyone (themselves included) in a 'surgical' fashion, making the user a Free Modification Human.

paramecia.name: Gura Gura no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to create vibrations, or 'quakes', making the user a Tremor Human.

paramecia.name: Ito Ito no Mi
paramecia.description: Allows the user to create and manipulate strings, making the user a String Human

paramecia.name: Gasha Gasha no Mi
paramecia.description: allows the user to telekinetically disassemble objects and reassemble them into whatever they please, making them an Assimilation Human.

logia.name: Goro Goro no Mi
logia.description: Grants the power to create, control, and transform into lightning at will, making its user a Lightning Human.

logia.name: Hie Hie no Mi
logia.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice at will, turning them into a Freezing Human.

logia.name: Mera Mera no Mi
logia.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will.

logia.name: Moku Moku no Mi
logia.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke at will.

logia.name: Suna Suna no Mi
logia.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand at will, turning the user into a Sand Human.

logia.name: Yami Yami no Mi
logia.description: Allows the user to create and control darkness at will, making them a Dark Man,

model.desc: Allows its user to transform into a hybrid of a human and a full human being at will.
A Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of an ancient wolf deity at will.
Allows its user to transform into a leopard hybrid and a full leopard at will, making the user a Leopard Human.
Allows its user to transform into a giraffe hybrid and a full giraffe at will, making the user a Giraffe Human.
Allows its user to transform into a full bison or a half-bison hybrid at will.
A Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of an Azure Dragon at will.
allows its user to turn into an axolotl hybrid and a full axolotl at will.
